channel.title: NPC/Player appear on different coordinates than they actually are
channel.description:
I've been working on my Pvp/PvN combat recently, and I've noticed that the NPC and/or player are actually on a different square/coordinate than they appear to be.
I can see this because when you follow the player/NPC, or they follow you, they attack you from a different spot, but when you log out and then back in, you or the player/NPC shows in the actual spot. I don't think It's anything to do with updating the player/player's appearance, because I have tried that and it has no effect on it :/.
I'll try and make a video if I can get the glitch to happen again, which is most likely because it happens quite often when attacking a player/NPC.
Any ideas anyone?
Thanks in advance.
